refnamediv.title: NAME
refnamediv.refpurpose: Virtual Pipe Organ Software. Testing performance

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: GrandOrguePerfTest is a commandline tool built together with GrandOrgue to test performance of the computer with different settings: Bits per sample, Sample Rate, Loseless compression, Linear/Polyphase interpolation and Sampes per buffer.
It outputs one line for each parameter set to the standard output. This line contains the 'limit:' value. It is the recommended maximum value for the Polyphony field in the GrandOrgan toolbar.
